flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to save up $100 because 14600 - 14500 = <<14600-14500=100>>100
He earned $60 off trips because 40 x 1.5 = <<40*1.5=60>>60
He earned $40 off groceries because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
He delivered $800 in groceries because 40 / 0.05 = <<40/0.05=8000>>8000
#### 8000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
